name: City Driving SL: Crazy Car Stu
name_original: City Driving SL: Crazy Car Stu
description:
City Driving SL: Crazy Car Stunts 3 is the new concept to drive the cool racing car with true axis and avoid the hurdles to get the level clear. Its all about exciting driving experience that will make you feel like driving crazy racing car.
Features:
- Realistic car stunt physics
- Real looking painted car models
- Many ramps spread all over the city
- Bill boards to tear your cars through them
- Amazing graphics
- New cars to select from
- Simple and addictive gameplay
